question: Working in an organisation which contributes to temples
answer:
QUESTION

is it ok to work in the Accounts dept. of an organisation which contributes to temples or for festivals in temples or which utilises an occasion like a temple festival to promote themselves (by sponsorship etc..) . The persons in the accounts dept. may or may not get involved in these money transactions or any co-ordination regarding this

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

It is permissible to work in the accounts department to the organization in reference on condition one does not engage in anyway in the organizationâ€™s monetary contributions to the temple or the festivals of the temple.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
